full_summary:
### SSC Raritan Products or Equivalent - Tender for Classified Data Centers

**Tender Description**

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting contractors to submit a proposal for the procurement of Raritan Power Distribution Units (PDU) for the lifecycle and support of the DND/CAF (Department of National Defence/Canadian Armed Forces) C2 Classified Server rooms/Data Centers.

**Background**

The current infrastructure in these rooms is outdated and no longer meets the technical requirements of newer technologies being deployed in these Data Centers. As a result, DND/CAF has already replaced some of the older infrastructure to ensure compatibility, interoperability, and interchangeability with the current design.

**Requirements**

To meet the technical specifications of the hardware being installed in the racks and to future-proof and permit increased monitoring and serviceability of the Classified systems supporting DND/CAF operations, the SSC is seeking a contractor to provide Raritan PDU equipment or equivalent solutions.

**Submission Requirements**

Proposals must be submitted via [SSC P2P](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/01071AFC-EC82-4130-B6E3-B9222362F061). The closing date for submissions is March 05, 2024 at 3:00 PM.

**Contact Information**

For further information or to discuss the proposal, please contact Oliver Librada at <oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca> or 343-542-8460.

**Reference Information**

* Solicitation Number: BPM020853/25608
* Tender Closing Date: March 05, 2024 3:00 PM
* Contracting Authority: Oliver Librada

**Downloadable Attachments**

The following attachments are available for download:
* [Raritan Products or Equivalent - Annex A](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/61D234B0-167B-4A49-A76D-313858E3AE5D)
* [Raritan Products or Equivalent - Annex B](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/F90B8BF8-9E82-4FC2-AABC-452B786EF3D9)
